enhanced_description: Zalaris HR Services, powered by PeopleHub, is a comprehensive one-stop shop for HR and payroll. With over two decades of uninterrupted growth and exceptionally high client net promoter scores, Zalaris operates across Europe and Asia Pacific, serving clients in over 100 countries worldwide through a unique international delivery model that combines global reach with locally based support. The services encompass integrated Core HR software for managing people profiles, organization charts, employee benefits, documents, time and attendance, and compliance. Additionally, Zalaris offers Travel & Expense Services for greater visibility of costs and compliance with local tax regulations, alongside a fully automated Recruiting Solution complemented by expert advice for best practices.
